snippet: The iconoclastic English fashion designer and environmental activist Vivienne Westwood delivers some hard truths to her high-fashion peers at the IHT Luxury Conference: The Promise of Africa, The Power of the Mediterranean.
abstract: The iconoclastic English fashion designer and environmental activist Vivienne Westwood delivers some hard truths to her high-fashion peers at the IHT Luxury Conference: The Promise of Africa, The Power of the Mediterranean.

headline.main: 'We Will Not Save the World by Fashion'
